title: In Christ Alone
lyrics_raw:
<1>
In [G]Christ a[D]lone my [G]hope is [A]found.
[D/F#]He is my [G]light, my [Em7]strength, my [D]song.
This [G]Corner[D]stone, this [G]solid [A]Ground,
[D/F#]Firm through the [G]fiercest [Em7]drought and [D]storm.
What [D/F#]heights of [G]love, what [D/F#]depths of [Asus]peace!
When [D/F#]fears are [G]stilled, when [Bm7]strivings [Asus]cease!
My [G]Comfor[D]ter, my [G]All in [A]All:
[D/F#]Here in the [G]love of [Em7]Christ I [D]stand.
</1>
<2>
In [G]Christ a[D]lone! who [G]took on [A]flesh,
[D/F#]Fullness of [G]God in [Em7]helpless [D]babe!
This [G]Gift of [D]love and [G]righteous[A]ness,
[D/F#]Scorned by the [G]ones He [Em7]came to [D]save.
Till [D/F#]on that [G]cross as [D/F#]Jesus [Asus]died,
The [D/F#]wrath of [G]God was [Bm7]satis[Asus]fied.
For [G]every [D]sin on [G]Him was [A]laid:
[D/F#]Here in the [G]death of [Em7]Christ I [D]live.
</2>
<3>
There [G]in the [D]ground His [G]body [A]lay,
[D/F#]Light of the [G]world by [Em7]darkness [D]slain.
Then [G]bursting [D]forth in [G]glorious [A]Day,
[D/F#]Up from the the [G]grave He [Em7]rose a[D]gain!
And [D/F#]as He [G]stands in [D/F#]victo[Asus]ry,
Sin's [D/F#]curse has [G]lost it's [Bm7]grip on [Asus]me!
For [G]I am [D]His and [G]He in [A]mine,
[D/F#]Bought with the [G]precious [Em7]blood of [D]Christ.
</3>
<4>
No [G]guilt in [D]life, no [G]fear in [A]death,
[D/F#]This is the [G]power of [Em7]Christ in [D]me!
From [G]life's first [D]cry to [G]final [A]breath,
[D/F#]Jesus com[G]mands my [Em7]desti[D]ny!
No [D/F#]power of [G]hell, no [D/F#]scheme of [Asus]man,
Can [D/F#]ever [G]pluck me [Bm7]from His [Asus]hand!
Till [G]He re[D]turns or [G]calls me [A]home:
[D/F#]Here in the [G]power of [Em7]Christ I'll [D]stand!
</4>

content.origin:
In [G]Christ a[D]lone my [G]hope is [A]found.
[D/F#]He is my [G]light, my [Em7]strength, my [D]song.
This [G]Corner[D]stone, this [G]solid [A]Ground,
[D/F#]Firm through the [G]fiercest [Em7]drought and [D]storm.
What [D/F#]heights of [G]love, what [D/F#]depths of [Asus]peace!
When [D/F#]fears are [G]stilled, when [Bm7]strivings [Asus]cease!
My [G]Comfor[D]ter, my [G]All in [A]All:
[D/F#]Here in the [G]love of [Em7]Christ I [D]stand.

In [G]Christ a[D]lone my [G]hope is [A]found.
[D/F#]He is my [G]light, my [Em7]strength, my [D]song.
This [G]Corner[D]stone, this [G]solid [A]Ground,

content.origin_text:
In Christ alone my hope is found.
He is my light, my strength, my song.
This Cornerstone, this solid Ground,
Firm through the fiercest drought and storm.
What heights of love, what depths of peace!
When fears are stilled, when strivings cease!
My Comforter, my All in All:
Here in the love of Christ I stand.
content.region_text:

Firm through the fiercest drought and storm.
What heights of love, what depths of peace!
When fears are stilled, when strivings cease!
My Comforter, my All in All:
Here in the love of Christ I stand.
content.origin_chord: In Christ alone my hope is found. He is my light, my strength, my song. This Cornerstone, this solid Ground, Firm through the fiercest drought and storm. What heights of love, what depths of peace! When fears are stilled, when strivings cease! My Comforter, my All in All: Here in the love of Christ I stand.

[D/F#]Here in the [G]death of [Em7]Christ I [D]live.

content.origin_text:
In Christ alone! who took on flesh,
Fullness of God in helpless babe!
This Gift of love and righteousness,
Scorned by the ones He came to save.
Till on that cross as Jesus died,
The wrath of God was satisfied.
For every sin on Him was laid:
Here in the death of Christ I live.

Here in the death of Christ I live.

content.origin_text:
There in the ground His body lay,
Light of the world by darkness slain.
Then bursting forth in glorious Day,
Up from the the grave He rose again!
And as He stands in victory,
Sin's curse has lost it's grip on me!
For I am His and He in mine,
Bought with the precious blood of Christ.

Then bursting forth in glorious Day,
Up from the the grave He rose again!
And as He stands in victory,
Sin's curse has lost it's grip on me!
For I am His and He in mine,
Bought with the precious blood of Christ.

And as He stands in victory, Sin's curse has lost it's grip on me! For I   am His and He in mine, Bought with the precious blood of Christ.

content.origin_text:
No guilt in life, no fear in death,
This is the power of Christ in me!
From life's first cry to final breath,
Jesus commands my destiny!
No power of hell, no scheme of man,
Can ever pluck me from His hand!
Till He returns or calls me home:
Here in the power of Christ I'll stand!
content.region_text:
No guilt in life, no fear in death,
This is the power of Christ in me!
From life's first cry to final breath,
Jesus commands my destiny!
No power of hell, no scheme of man,
Can ever pluck me from His hand!
Till He returns or calls me home:
Here in the power of Christ I'll stand!
content.origin_chord: No guilt in life, no fear in death, This is the power of Christ in me! From life's first cry to final breath, Jesus commands my destiny! No power of hell, no scheme of man, Can ever pluck me from His hand! Till He returns or calls me home: Here in the power of Christ I'll stand!

title: 一顆謙卑的心
author: 張靜雅
lyrics_raw:
<1>
求[D]你給我一顆[Bm]謙卑的心
給[G]我一[D/F#]個受[Em]教的[A]靈
好讓[G]我能走在[D]你的旨意[Bm]裡
如[Em]同耶[E7/Ab]穌的生[A7]命
[region 2]
Lord I desire to be humble like You
Give me a teachable spirit
May Your way be done fullfilled in my life
Just a the life of Jesus
</1>
<chorus>
幫助[D]我更多[Bm]的禱告
幫助[G]我[D/F#]更深[Em]的倚[A7]靠
單單[G]相信你  深深[D]敬畏[Bm]你
一[Em]生要[A]跟隨[D]你
[region 2]
Help me Lord, pray unceasingly
Help me Lord, put my trust in You
I will trust You alone
I will always honor You
My life is in Your hand
</chorus>

content.origin:
求[D]你給我一顆[Bm]謙卑的心
給[G]我一[D/F#]個受[Em]教的[A]靈
好讓[G]我能走在[D]你的旨意[Bm]裡
如[Em]同耶[E7/Ab]穌的生[A7]命
content.region:

Give me a teachable spirit

title: Be Thou My Vision
author: Eleanor H. Hull
lyrics_raw:
<1>
[D]Be thou my [Bm]vision, O [G]Lord of my [D]heart
[A]Naught be all else to me, [G]save that Thou [A]Art
[Bm]Thou my best [G]thought, by [D]day or by [G/A]night
[D]Waking or [Bm]sleeping, Thy [G]presence my [D]light
[Region 2]
主作我異象 作我心主宰
此世間只有祢  是我所愛
暝日我心神 思念祢無停
祢做我光燈  互我有光明
</1>
<2>
[D]Be Thou my [Bm]wisdom, and [G]Thou my true [D]word
[A]I ever with Thee and [G]Thou with me, [A]Lord
[Bm]Thou my great [G]Father, and [D]I Thy true [G/A]son
[D]Thou in me [Bm]dwelling and [G]I with Thee [D]one
[Region 2]
主做我智慧   作我的真道
永與我同在  指示復保護
祢是我天父  我作祢的子
祢及我居起  我與祢同行
</2>
<3>
[D]Riches I heed [Bm]not, nor [G]man’s empty [D]praise
[A]Thou mine Inheritance, [G]now and al[A]ways
[Bm]Thou and Thou [G]only, [D]first in my [G/A]heart
[D]High King of [Bm]Heaven, my [G]Treasure Thou [D]art
[Region 2]
錢財與名聲   我並無貪戀
祢做我產業  今日到永遠
我心只有祢  沒別項可比
天頂大君王  最寶貴是祢
</3>
<4>
[D]High King of [Bm]Heaven, my [G]victory [D]won
[A]May I reach Heaven’s joys, [G]O bright Heaven’s [A]Sun
[Bm]Heart of my [G]own heart, what[D]ever be[G/A]fall
[D]Still be my [Bm]Vision, O [G]Ruler of [D]all
[Region 2]
天頂大君王  助我常得勝
引導我進前  歡喜入天庭
無論何環境  主住我心內
永作我異象  萬物大主宰
</4>

content.origin:
[D]Be thou my [Bm]vision, O [G]Lord of my [D]heart
[A]Naught be all else to me, [G]save that Thou [A]Art
[Bm]Thou my best [G]thought, by [D]day or by [G/A]night
[D]Waking or [Bm]sleeping, Thy [G]presence my [D]light
content.region:

此世間只有祢 是我所愛
暝日我心神 思念祢無停
祢做我光燈 互我有光明

Thou mine Inheritance, now and always
Thou and Thou only, first in my heart
High King of Heaven, my Treasure Thou art

[A]May I reach Heaven’s joys, [G]O bright Heaven’s [A]Sun
[Bm]Heart of my [G]own heart, what[D]ever be[G/A]fall

content.origin_text:
High King of Heaven, my victory won
May I reach Heaven’s joys, O bright Heaven’s Sun
Heart of my own heart, whatever befall
Still be my Vision, O Ruler of all
